Olathe.Olathe West High School: Olathe West High School is a fully accredited public high school located in Olathe, Kansas, United States, serving students in grades 9–11 and expanding to include grades 9–12 for the 2018–2019 school year. The school is one of five high schools in the Olathe School District and also one of fourteen in the Sunflower League. The school colors are royal blue, silver, and navy, and the school mascot is the Owl.
